message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $12,000. It's a great deal for both of us. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. However, I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately I can't go that low. I'm willing to come down to $11,000, which is still a great deal for both of us. Let's see if we can make this work.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I am still not able to meet you at $11,000. I am willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. Let me know if this revised offer is acceptable.
